results.name: Partly Skimmed Milk 2% MF
results.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

results.name: Partly Skimmed Milk 1% MF
results.description: Rich in nutrients, milk has been a food staple for centuries. Used in cooking, baking or simply as a wholesome beverage, Milk is a great way to get calcium and protein into your diet. Whole milk contains at least 3.25% milk fat. When a portion of the milk’s fat is removed, it becomes partly skimmed milk, such as 2% milk and 1% milk, depending on the quantity removed. Skim milk is virtually fat-free, with only about 0.1% fat.

results.name: Homogenized Milk 3.25%
results.description: Homgenized Milk has undergone a 'homogenization' process that breaks up and mixes the fat particles in milk, suspending them within the milk so that the cream no longer floats to the top as it does in unprocessed milk. Homogenized milk has more consistent, creamier taste and texture.

results.name: Lactose Free 2% Partly Skimmed Ultrafiltered Milk
results.description:
An incredibly delicious and nutritious way to help get you through your busy day, Fairlife is a lactose-free ultrafiltered skim milk with 50% more protein and 50% less sugar than regular milk.Fairlife nutrient-rich milk is made possible with our patented cold-filtration process. This process was inspired by the same process that removes impurities from water. Fairlife milk flows through soft filters to concentrate its goodness like protein while filtering out much of the natural sugar. That allows us to bottle only delicious, nutrient-rich ultrafiltered milk to help you fuel your busy life. Enjoy!
  • fairlife® 2% Ultrafiltered Partly Skimmed Milk has less sugar and more protein than regular milk
  • 50% less sugar and 50% more protein than regular milk
  • 1.5 L Bottle, 13g of protein per serving
  • Proudly made with 100% Canadian Milk
  • Lactose-free with a source of 9 essential nutrients

results.name: Oreo Original Cookies
results.description:
Canada's #1 Cookie Brand - OREO Original Sandwich Cookies are grabbable, snackable, and forever dunkable. The combination of two delicious sensations—rich chocolate wafer cookies and smooth sweet creme. OREO cookies are the perfect snack.

  • This package contains 1 resealable 270g pack of OREO Original Sandwich Cookies.
  • Nothing compares to the iconic OREO. The classic combo of cream sandwiched between two chocolate cookies has been winning hearts (and stomachs) for over 100 years.
  • Packable, snackable, and forever dunkable, the classic OREO makes for the perfect afternoon pick-me-up, shareable snack, or sweet treat.
  • Great for gatherings, lunchboxes, road trips, and more. Everyone’s favourite cookie will sweeten the day for family, friends and colleagues, or just for yourself.
  • Kosher cookies always made with real cocoa. Each serving of cookies is 160 calories.

results.name: Almond Beverage, Unsweetened Original, Dairy-Free
results.description:
Oh, yes, it is… a mere 30 calories per serving. Enjoy the goodness of Silk® Unsweetened Original Almond Beverage for less than half the calories of skim milk. Over cereal, in recipes and more, you won’t miss the sugar, and you’ll be delighted by the taste.
  • Vegan
  • Dairy free
  • Absolutely no cholesterol or saturated fat
  • Verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program
  • No artificial colours, flavors or funny business

results.name: TruTaste Homogenized Milk

Homogenized milk has more consistent, creamier taste and texture.

results.name: Honey Nut Cheerios Breakfast Cereal, Family Size, Whole Grains
results.description:
General Mills Honey Nut Cheerios makes every day brighter. With the goodness of Cheerios and the taste of golden honey, savour a bowl of Honey Nut Cheerios and give yourself a moment of enjoyment. Because every day could use a touch of honey. This cereal is perfect for breakfast with milk, as an afternoon snack, or added to your favourite trail mix or cereal bars. Honey Nut Cheerios Breakfast Cereal is a family favourite perfect for kids, adults, and everyone in between. This tasty cereal is made with real honey and whole grain oats and includes three grams of fibre per serving. Contains one 725 gram Family Size cereal box in total.
  • BREAKFAST CEREAL: With the goodness of Cheerios and the taste of golden honey, savour a bowl of Honey Nut Cheerios and give yourself a moment of enjoyment; perfect for breakfast, as a snack, or added to your favourite trail mix or cereal bars
  • HONEY NUT FLAVOUR: Simply made whole grain oats and sweetened with real honey and natural almond flavour; A family favourite perfect for kids, adults, and everyone in between
  • DELICIOUS SNACK: Made with real honey and whole grain oats and includes three grams of fibre per serving; No artificial flavours or colours
  • PANTRY FAVOURITE: A pantry and kids snacking favourite; Family Size box is a perfect addition to your weekly groceries and on-the-go snack
  • CONTAINS: 725 g, one ct

results.name: Cinnamon Toast Crunch Breakfast Cereal, Family Size, Whole Grains
results.description:
Wake up to the epic combination of cinnamon and sugar in Cinnamon Toast Crunch Breakfast Cereal. Every crispy square is blasted with Cinnadust, the irresistible mix of real cinnamon and sugar that makes your mouth happy. Parents like that each crispy square is made with whole grain wheat, and without artificial flavours or colours. Plus, every serving provides vitamins and minerals as part of a delicious kids breakfast. The classic kids snack is a favourite with grown-ups, too. This cereal is perfect for breakfast with milk, as an afternoon snack, or added to your favourite cereal bars or party mix. Contains one 591 gram Family Size cereal box in total.
  • BREAKFAST CEREAL: Wake up to the epic combination of cinnamon and sugar in Cinnamon Toast Crunch Breakfast Cereal; perfect for breakfast with milk, as an afternoon snack, or added to your favourite cereal bars or party mix
  • SWEET CINNAMON SUGAR: Crispy, sweetened whole wheat and rice squares are blasted with Cinnadust, the irresistible mix of real cinnamon and sugar that makes your mouth happy
  • WHOLE GRAINS: Made with whole grains as the first ingredient and made with real cinnamon; No artificial flavours or colours
  • PANTRY FAVOURITE: A pantry and kids snacking favourite; Family Size box is a perfect addition to your weekly groceries and on-the-go snack
  • CONTAINS: 591 g, one ct

results.name: Evaporated Milk
results.description: Simple Check™††The Simple Check™ symbol appears on no name® products made without 10 ingredients* such as synthetic colours††, artificial flavours and artificial sweeteners.*As per Canadian regulations, this product cannot contain some of these ingredients.††As defined in Canadian regulations.To learn more: www.noname.ca/simplecheck

results.name: Almond Beverage, Original, Plant Based Dairy-Free Milk
results.description:
How will you enjoy the smooth taste of Silk® Original Almond Beverage? Probably with a great big smile on your face! At a sensible 60 calories a serving, it’s delicious over cereal, in coffee, as part of a favourite recipe or served straight up in a glass.
  • Vegan
  • Dairy free
  • Absolutely no cholesterol or saturated fat
  • Verified by the Non-GMO Project’s product verification program
  • No artificial colours, flavors or funny business

results.description: Very high in calcium, this fresh skim milk contains 0.1% milk fat. A great option for organic lifestyles and also an easy way to control fat intake whether enjoyed as a drink or used in everyday meals and beverages.

results.name: Lactose Free Homogenized Milk
results.description: Lactose Free Milk is the same as regular milk but has added lactase to help break down the lactose.

results.name: Coconut Milk
results.description: Use Coconut Milk in a variety of sweet and savoury dishes. Great for everyday use, add creamy coconut milk to curries, stews, smoothies, and more.

results.name: Smiles Potatoes
results.description:
It’s
  hard not to be happy when you serve McCain Smiles potatoes. These fun and
  delicious mashed potato shaped Smiles are sure to brighten everyone’s day.
  Playful and pleasing, kids of all ages will gobble up these crispy Smiles
  potatoes that are ready in a jiffy. Serve them up as an easy side dish with
  your next meal or as a fast snack and you can be sure that every member of
  your family will definitely be happy to see these delicious McCain
  Smiles.

results.name: SuperSpirals Lightly Spiced Fries
results.description:
Get a
  new spin on snack time with McCain SuperSpirals lightly spiced fries. These
  spiral cut fries make for a fast and delicious side that are fun for the
  whole family. Curly shaped and lightly spiced, McCain spiral fries are an
  epic twist on a classic treat that everyone will enjoy. They're made from
  specially selected potatoes, and are trans-fat and cholesterol-free so you
  can feel good about serving them to your family. Easy to prepare, our curly
  fries make dinner fast and delicious any day of the week.

results.name: Tasti Taters Potato Bites
results.description:
When
  is food tasty and fun? When it's McCain Tasti Taters. Made from real
  potatoes, Tasti Taters are bite-sized bits of deliciousness - crispy on the
  outside and soft on the inside. So easy to prepare - just pop them into a
  pre-heated oven or toaster oven for about 25 minutes and you'll be all set to
  add excitement for breakfast, lunch or dinner. Serve McCain Tasti Taters as a
  fast and easy dinner side dish with your family's next meal and you'll find
  out that your kids won't be the only ones having fun.

results.name: Breakfast Potato Pancakes
results.description: Enjoy the great taste of potato pancakes without all the work. McCain Potato Pancakes are so easy to prepare they make mealtime a snap. These delicious breakfast potatoes are made with real shredded potatoes that have been lightly seasoned with onions and spices and are perfect to enjoy with breakfast or as a side dish at dinner. A savoury treat, these potato pancakes are also trans-fat and cholesterol free so you can feel good serving them to your family.
